sentence.Network_en: Can you see what this note says — his writing is almost illegible!
sentence.Network_cn: 你能看出这个便条上写些什么吗?他的笔迹几乎无法辨认.

sentence.Network_en: It is impossible to deliver this letter because the address is illegible.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于地址字迹不清,致使信件无法投递.

sentence.Network_en: My secretary worked long hours translating my almost illegible writing into a typewritten and readable script.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的秘书花了很长时间把我写的几乎无法辨认的手稿用打字机打印成易读的文本。

entry.tran: 字迹模糊的;难以辨认的
entry.def: Writing that is illegible is so unclear that you cannot read it.

auth_sentence.content: Its pages are covered with David's illegible scrawl.
auth_sentence.res_content: Its pages are covered with David's illegible scrawl.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its pages are covered with David's illegible scrawl.

auth_sentence.content: Her illegible messages zigzagging off the page in a pencil-breaking scrawl.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her illegible messages zigzagging off the page in a pencil-breaking scrawl.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her illegible messages zigzagging off the page in a pencil-breaking scrawl.

auth_sentence.content: The printout was so faint that most of it was illegible.
auth_sentence.res_content: The printout was so faint that most of it was illegible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The printout was so faint that most of it was illegible.

stems_affixes.word_buile: il不+legal合法的→adj.非法的
il不+legitimate合法的→adj.不合法的,私生的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 法律的,法定的;合法的,正当的
stems_affixes.word_buile: leg法律+al……的→adj.法律的,法定的;合法的,正当的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 合法的, 合理的, 正统的
stems_affixes.word_buile: leg法律+itm+ate表形容词→adj.合法的, 合理的, 正统的
il不+legible可读的→adj.难读的,难认的
legend[n.传说,传奇;图例]+ary……的→adj.传说的,传奇的
leg讲,读,说+ible能……的→能够读的
de加强+leg法律+ate人,也可表示动词→加强法律之人→代表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不法, 私生, 反常, 不合逻辑

stems_affixes.value_cn: 学院,高等专科学校,大学

leg讲,读,说+end→讲出的东西→传奇的故事;引申为地图的图例

stems_affixes.value_cn: 功课,课;一堂课,一节课;[常复]课程;教训

re反+leg法律+ate表动词→反法律的人被放逐
al再+leg讲,读,说+e→一再讲→宣称

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"使……,成为,进入,再"; 2. 放在同辅音词根前表示"不,无"

il不,无+logical逻辑的→adj.不合逻辑的
